title: Items with unwarrented movement speed
body: Honestly, what is with this? why do so many ap items give decent movement speed buffs? as if the idea of tf wasnt enough, now he's a marathon runner from core items alone.

replies.body:
> why do so many ap items give decent movement speed buffs?

All 2 items? lol

5 items exists that give AP and movement speed. {{item:3078}} {{item:3100}} {{item:3285}} {{item:3023}}{{item:3504}} 
EDIT: forget ardent censor.

Tri isn't an AP item, it's a hybrid item really with more leaning towards AD champs and Twin Shadows is more of a support item. Ardent Censor is being missed in your list though, but, again, it's a support item.
None of you read what I said. I said there are 4 items that give ap and movement speed.
ahh http://gameinfo.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/game-info/items/ this page is out of date I guess.

Tri is NEVER built on an AP champ LOLZ

And you don't build support items on AP carries, cause that's truly what the OP was QQing about that the slow ass mages finally have some movement speed to at least make them slightly more competitive in this INSANE mobility creep.
Those two items give a surprising amount, when a tf has nearly 500 movement speed from items and no ghost, its a bit much.

> why do so many ap items give decent movement speed buffs? 

Like {{item:3285}} and {{item:3100}}? Don't even try to give me that {{item:3023}} crap because nobody builds it

**Meanwhile AD Items:**

{{item:3153}} {{item:3087}} {{item:3046}} {{item:3044}} {{item:3078}} {{item:3142}} {{item:3172}}
